Class PipeNetworkBlock<T extends PipeNetworkEntity>

java.lang.Object
net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockBehaviour

com.larashores.laraspipes.network.PipeNetworkBlock<T>

public class PipeNetworkBlock<T extends PipeNetworkEntity> extends net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block implements net.minecraft.world.level.block.EntityBlock
Block that belongs to a PipeNetwork.

    • CONNECTED

      public static final Map<net.minecraft.core.Direction,net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.properties.BooleanProperty> CONNECTED
      Block states that determine if the PipeNetworkBlock is connected to another PipeNetworkBlock along a given direction.

    • getStateForPlacement

      @Nullable public @Nullable net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState getStateForPlacement(net.minecraft.world.item.context.BlockPlaceContext context)
      Sets the initial state of the block as it is placed. Sets the CONNECTED states along any directions in which there is another PipeNetworkBlock to connect to.
      Overrides:
      getStateForPlacement in class net.minecraft.world.level.block.Block
      Parameters:
      context - Details on how the block was placed.
      Returns:
      The initial block state.

    • onPlace

      public void onPlace(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state, net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState oldState, boolean isMoving)
      Called whenever a PipeNetworkBlock is added or its state is updated. If the block is being added to a position for the first time (rather than just having its state updated), the states of adjacent PipeNetworkBlocks will be updated to set the correct connections.
      Overrides:
      onPlace in class net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockBehaviour
      Parameters:
      state - The block state of the block being added.
      level - The level the block belongs to.
      pos - The position of the block.
      oldState - State of the block at the specified pos before the current block was placed.
      isMoving - Whether the block is being moved from one position to another (e.g. by a piston).

    • onRemove

      public void onRemove(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state, net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState newState, boolean isMoving)
      Called whenever a PipeNetworkBlock is removed. If the block is being fully removed from a position (rather than just having its state updated), the states of adjacent PipeNetworkBlocks will be updated to unset the correct connections.
      Overrides:
      onRemove in class net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockBehaviour
      Parameters:
      state - The block state of the block being removed.
      level - The level the block belongs to.
      pos - The position of the block.
      newState - State that will replace the block at the specified position after this block is removed.
      isMoving - Whether the block is being moved from one position to another (e.g. by a piston).

    • setConnectionStates

      public net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState setConnectionStates(net.minecraft.world.level.Level level, net.minecraft.core.BlockPos pos, net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state)
      Sets the CONNECTED block state of a corresponding to each Direction.
      Parameters:
      level - The level the block belongs to.
      pos - The position of the block to set the states for.
      state - The current state of the block.
      Returns:
      The new state of the block.

    • canConnect

      public boolean canConnect(net.minecraft.world.level.block.state.BlockState state, net.minecraft.core.Direction direction)
      Determines whether another PipeNetworkBlock can connect to this block along the specified direction.
      Parameters:
      state - The state of the block.
      direction - The direction to connect along.
      Returns:
